DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study assess safety CC-1088 patient myelodysplastic syndrome ( MDS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Determine Safety Preliminary Efficacy CC-1088 Treatment Myelodysplastic Syndromes
DOC.criteria: Eligible patient must diagnosis MDS least 12 week therapy relate . Patient must able adhere study visit schedule protocol requirement . Patient must understand voluntarily sign informed consent document . Women childbearing potential ( WCBP ) must negative serum urine pregnancy test . Women must pregnant lactating .
